text: But Karlie Kloss came to the rescue to wish happy birthday to the singer with a cute selfie snap. T - Swift is now 28 - years - old. While Taylor already was losing friends, according to reports, one of her latest singles, ` ` Look What You Made Me Do,'' didn't help matters at all, as she called out Kanye West, Katy Perry, and others, reportedly leaving a former friend, Kendall Jenner, furious. “ Since Taylor ’ s been in hiding Kendall ’ s very much the queen bee these days, so what she says goes for the majority of that group. She ’ s made it clear that anyone listening or supporting Taylor will be banned from her circle instantly, and the likes of Gigi, Bella and Cara are all doing as they ’ re told,
